content: गुणिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गुण-इन्] {@--1@} Possessed of or endowed with merits, meritorious; गुणी गुणं वेत्ति न वेत्ति निर्गुणः; <ls>Ms. 8. 73</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 78.</ls> {@--2@} Good, auspicious; गुणिन्यहनि <ls>Dk. 61.</ls> {@--3@} Familiar with the merits of anything. {@--4@} Possessing qualities (as an object). {@--5@} Possessed of the three qualities; <ls>Ve. 6. 42.</ls> {@--6@} Having (subordinate) parts, principal (<ab>opp.</ab> गुण); गुणगुणिनोरेव संबंधः. --नी A bow.
